## Brownies `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

250g dark chocolate \
100ml oil \
200ml milk \
1tsp vanilla \
175g P flour \
50g cocoa \
150g light brown sugar \
1/2tsp salt \
1tsp BP \
200g choc chips

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

160° \
20-25mins \
9" square

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Melt chocolate slowly.
1. Whisk in wet.
1. Fold in mixed dry.
1. Cool in tin, then in fridge for few hours before cutting.

*Notes*

- Very rich and dark, so cut very small (40).

## Coffee fudge squares

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

6oz marg \
6oz caster sugar \
8oz SR flour \
1.5tsp BP \
3 eggs \
2tbsp milk \
1tbsp coffee

Topping: \
2oz butter \
4oz light brown sugar \
2tbsp milk \
up to 10oz icing sugar \
walnuts

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
30mins \
rectangle

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Melt butter, sugar, milk gently until dissolves.
1. Boil briskly 3 mins.
1. Stir in icing sugar, beat and spread quickly.

## Lemon bars `r family`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

Base: \
6oz P flour \
4oz marg \
2oz caster sugar

Filling: \
200g caster sugar \
25g P flour \
pinch salt \
3 eggs \
3 lemon zest \
200ml lemon juice (3-4 lemons)

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
15-20mins \

160° \
10-15mins \
8" square

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Bake shortbread at 180 for 15-20mins.
1. Whisk filling together while base is cooling, pour over and bake at 160 for 10-15 mins (until top is just set). 
1. Dust with icing sugar.

## Lemon bars `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

Base: use shortbread base from other recipe.

Filling: \ 
177ml lemon juice (about 4 large lemons) \
Optional 2tsp lemon zest \
300g caster sugar \
296 coconut milk - mostly the thick part \
6tbs cornflour \
pinch turmeric

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
15mins \
8" square

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Bake base.
1. Whisk filling ingredients well and heat over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture thickens.
1. Spread over base and bake.
1. Chill 1-2 hours or overnight until set.

*Notes*

- Nice, very lemony/tart, even without zest.

## Peppermint mini rolls `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

150ml [aquafaba](#sec-aquafaba) \
100g caster sugar \
80g P flour \
2tbsp cocoa \
1/2tsp BP \
1/4 tsp vanilla 

Filling: \
125g butter \
125g icing sugar \
1tsp milk \
few drops peppermint extract

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

24 x 32 cm

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Whip [aquafaba](#sec-aquafaba) to almost stiff peaks.
1. Add sugar in spoonful at a time, whilst whipping to stiff.
1. Add whites to dry ingredients in 2 alternating lots.
1. Spread in tin and bake 5 mins at 220, then 5-10mins at 180.
1. Cool 2mins, roll, then leave to cool.
1. Spread filling, roll and chill 30mins.
1. Coat in 180g chocolate and chill to set.

*Notes*

- Very tasty. 
- [Aquafaba](#sec-aquafaba) whipping can take 15mins+. 
- Original recipe uses 3 eggs instead. -
- [Reddit tips for swiss roll](https://www.reddit.com/r/AskBaking/comments/lzpyg8/swiss_roll_disaster_rubbery_bottom_what_did_do/).

## Twix `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

Base: \
300g P flour \
10g caster sugar \
200g butter \
1tsp vanilla 

Filling: \
640g vegan condensed milk \
270g butter \
100g light brown sugar

250g chocolate to top

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

180° \
30mins \
8" square

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Bake shortbread until lightly golden then leave to cool.
1. Place all filling ingredients over low-medium heat until turn amber, stirring all the time - takes 15-20mins to reach firm ball stage.
1. Pour over base and chill 3-4hrs until set. 

*Notes*

- Softer and chewier than caramel shortbread - more like Twix.

![](pictures/twix-01.jpg)
